title: Invisible minions
body:
As the title said, I tried to get in 3vs3 ai bot for quick first win of the day (duh)
When the game loaded and minion spawned, I was pretty shocked that it shows on the minimap, but i couldn't see the minion.
I couldn't either click the minion, teleport to it, or attack click it.
I have video, but it won't allow me to post it. Anyway, I wonder what happened if I was playing ranked that time !!
FIX IT plz

replies.body: This generally happens when you've disconnected and reconnected. It actually happened to me on Hexakill last night. It's a known issue, and something we're looking into!

the minions have.... evolved. Countless battles have forced natural selection! They have gotten faster, smarter, more powerful, INVISIBLE! THE END IS NIGH NYLAGH CTHULU PHTAGN ##*(ASD:#W*(*WR*F*@P!_DJFSD::ds.................
